title: plz explain
body: i was going rengar top btw im bronze 5 but i can beat silver 4 players and badly enough i had to vs a garen and to make it worse he was a platinum 4 player like i never vs those type of ppl  the max i eva vs is gold 5 and thats really rare so can someone explain why this happened? its really bugging me{{champion:86}} {{champion:107}}

replies.body:
Hey LF Shorty,

Looking at your match history on [op.gg](http://oce.op.gg/summoner/userName=LF%20Shorty) I'm seeing you in a Normal match top Rengar vs. Garen. Normal MMR is completely separate from Ranked, so their rank doesn't affect how they are matched in Normals.

However, that Garen was Bronze 2. If he told you he was Plat 4 he was either lying, or talking about another account (or both).

Let me know if this wasn't the correct match, and link it from your match history.

-DTN

haha  that wasnt the right one if this helps his name was "TOXIC" and the thing u mite be running into is coz for some resome there r 2 ppl with the same name on my server when there shouldnt be and when i click on the garen it'll somtimes switch between there profiles there one TOXIC that is bronze 2 and then a TOXIC that is plat 4 in his promos and he also told me he was plat 4
No, that was the right match. It was a Normal game, not Ranked. The TOXIC in your game was spelled with an L not an i, which makes it look the same if you spell it in all caps.
and just my luck to he was in his promo's
